name: Fortegra Financial
overview: Fortegra Financial Corporation, an insurance services company, provides insurance-related products and distribution and administration services in the United States. Its Payment Protection segment offers a range of regulated insurance products, including credit property, credit life, credit disability, accidental death and dismemberment, involuntary unemployment, collateral protection, and single interest auto; administration services for financial products comprising debt cancellation plans, warranty products, and car club memberships; and policy and claims administration, captive reinsurance management, training, transition management, and policy tracking services. This segment provides its services to consumer finance companies, regional banks, community banks, retailers, small loan companies, warranty administrators, automobile dealers, vacation ownership developers, and credit unions. The companyâ€™s Business Process Outsourcing segment offers various outsourcing, administrative, marketing, and technology services to insurance and finance companies, banks, and retailers. This segment markets, develops, and administers insurance and other financial products, including life and health insurance products, debt cancellation, identity theft protection, and fee revenue programs and membership clubs. Its Wholesale Brokerage segment provides surplus lines insurance products consisting of various insurance coverage for businesses, such as commercial property, liability, package, automobile, garage, transportation and professional, and management liability; insurance products to individuals comprising personal liability and homeowners products; and insurance premium financing products and services, as well as underwriting services to insurance carriers. The company was formerly known as Life of the South Corporation and changed its name to Fortegra Financial Corporation in 2008. Fortegra Financial Corporation was incorporated in 1981 and is based in Jacksonville, Florida.

acquisitions.source_description: Fortegra Financial Announces Agreement to Acquire eReinsure, Inc.
